citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 pm on 30-
MAR-2023. The inspector arrived at the facility, knocked on the door, and spoke with a family member who stated the
licensee was not available for inspection since he would not be home until 5 pm.
Additional Inspectors:
COURTNEY JERNIGAN, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 pm on 30-
MAR-2023. The inspector arrived at the facility, knocked on the door, and spoke with a family member who stated the 
licensee was not available for inspection since he would not be home until 5 pm. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
COURTNEY JERNIGAN, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
